body_html:
Previously, I used pip to install TensorFlow. The TensorBoard shows nothing.
Today I try to build from the source. Then TensorBoard works!
@danmane
I am trying to pip install on another Linux machine to make sure that "pip install" can reproduce the problem.

I will let you know if I can reproduce that problem with pip installation.

body:
Previously, I used **pip to install TensorFlow**. The TensorBoard shows nothing.
Today I try to **build from the source**. Then TensorBoard works!
@danmane  
I am trying to pip install on another Linux machine to make sure that "pip install" can reproduce the problem. 

I will let you know if I can reproduce that problem with pip installation.
